title: Lando Norris's long list of mistakes that makes Piastri the new F1 title favourite
summary: Since scoring his maiden Formula 1 win in Miami a year ago, Lando Norris has enjoyed several highs, but also many lows which threaten to relegate him to second fiddle to Oscar Piastri if he doesn't bounce back quickly

qa_pairs.question: Who won their first Formula 1 race in Miami?
Which driver is currently considered a title favorite in the context of Lando Norris's performance?
What has Lando Norris experienced recently in his Formula 1 career that could impact his standing?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A mix of highs and lows
